snippet.title: Painted in Blood - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Tour a creepy world and see some of the dreadful creatures you'll fight in this new trailer for Painted in Blood, an upcoming game that blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements. Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically. Painted in Blood will be available on PC in 2025.

#PaintedInBlood #Gaming #Horror
